Class RedEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObjects
      • demolition.BomberChar
        • demolition.RedEnemy

  • public class RedEnemy
extends BomberChar
    Represents the enemy of player, red enemy

      • RedEnemy

        public RedEnemy(Tuple location)

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup(PApplet app)
        Loads in all the sprites required to generate the RedEnemy object's animation on the app. Requires Papplet object.
        Parameters:
        app - App of the game.

      • die

        public void die()
        RedEnemy dies. The object is removed from the app window.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Returns if the RedEnemy is alive.
        Returns:
        if the RedEnemy is alive.

      • tick

        public void tick(BomberMap map)
        Movement logic of the RedEnemy. The object moves in a straight line every second and turns to a random decision every time its path is blocked by a solid/broken wall.
        Parameters:
        map - Map of the current level.

      • draw

        public void draw(PApplet app)
        Draws the RedEnemy sprite on the app window. Frame count resets when it reaches the total frames of a cycle. Requires PApplet obejct.
        Parameters:
        app - App of the game.

      • getInitialLocation

        public Tuple getInitialLocation()
        Returns the initial location of the Red Rnemy. (Only for testing purposes)
        Returns:
        Initial location of the Red Enemy.
